content.body: PSA: Ecma is hiring a new Secretary General. Please share this announcement and encourage qualified candidates who can work in Geneva to send in their CVs before August 1st. You can find details at https://www.ecma-international.org/news/recruitment-of-a-new-secretary-general-for-ecma-international/

Please share this announcement and encourage qualified candidates who can work in Geneva to send in their CVs before August 1st. You can find details at https://www.ecma-international.org/news/recruitment-of-a-new-secretary-general-for-ecma-international/
